}}'''''The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power (Season One: Amazon Original Series Soundtrack)''''' is an album which was composed by [[Bear McCreary]] for the first season of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'' television series. It was released online on [[19 August]], [[2022]] by Amazon Music.
